name: Gold Miner (nvgamepad)
description:
This one is a match 3 kind of game. If you want to relax your brain I suggest you could try. I make the game easy at first ( easy in general ) for your brain to be relax. 

I hope you enjoy... and leave a comments. bye

Below is a description I put in google-play for keyword only. Don't read it ;) 

Get GOLD MINER! for MINING GAMES FREE! Best free gold miner game! Like digging games, mining games, and other miner games? You’ll LOVE our Free Gold Miner Rush and its amazing retro graphic game app - GOLD MINER FREE! 

⛏️ Play Gold mine games FREE - 1000 levels await you! Play in English or Spanish!
Show great reaction, decision making and luck will follow you to solve random mining items with match 3 games concept of puzzle games. We hope you will be having fun, enjoy and feel relaxed during the game-play.
